attributes.action: UK to stop buying Russian oil tainted in Ukrainian blood.
attributes.additional_details: Because the governments job is to represent the people of the uk. As a UK citizen I choose to pay more at the pump rather than help President Putin pay for his war by buying his oil.
attributes.background: Unilaterally ban all oil and gas imports into the United Kingdom, until there is a complete withdrawal of Russian military forces from Ukraine and appropriate reparations are paid to Ukraine and it’s people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610289
